title: Live:The Room Podcast X Partiful Interview
description: This year, in partnership with Season 12 sponsors Mercury and Perkins Coie, and location sponsor Level Ten, Madison and Claudia will record a live episode featuring an interview with Shreya Murthy, CEO and co-founder of Partiful. Following the show, attendees will have the chance to connect with other founders and investors during a cocktail reception.

title: You Can’T Scale Vibes: HR & Comp That Fuel Growth
description: Let's get real—your startup might thrive on energy, vision, and good vibes right now, but that doesn't scale. Many startups hit growth mode without clear structures for talent and human capital, leading to retention challenges and difficulty recruiting top talent. This Tech Week, join Aaron Thweatt (Executive Coach and former SpaceX compensation strategist who structured 3,000+ job offers during hypergrowth) as he breaks down how to build a scalable HR and compensation philosophy. Learn to create clarity and trust without bureaucracy, avoid common pitfalls that cause top talent to leave, and lay the groundwork for sustainable growth. Whether you're a founder planning your next hires or a fractional leader managing growth, this session will equip you with essential frameworks to scale your company effectively and retain your best people. This event is a part of #NYTechWeek—a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem. Learn more at www.tech-week.com.

title: Corporate Innovation Forum
description: B Capital, InnoLead, Prudential and SVB are hosting a Corporate Innovation Forum in Hudson Yards. We’re bringing together corporate innovators across industries for an afternoon of curated connections, light bites, and small roundtable discussions around focused topics. You can expect thoughtful discussions with senior leaders on topics like: - Key learnings from AI pilots - Scouting and pilot testing emerging tech beyond AI - Dynamics surrounding corporate VC and startup engagement in 2025 - Building strong relationships between innovation and the rest of the organization - Dynamics surrounding corporate accelerators & venture incubation This event is geared to senior professionals working in large organizations. This event is a part of #TechWeek - a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem. https://www.tech-week.com/

title: B2b Startup Founders - Networking And Panel
description: Building a B2B startup isn’t a walk in the park. With sales cycles that stretch on and buying committees that grow ever more complex, founders face challenges that are uniquely brutal. In today’s dynamic landscape—where AI is reshaping the way we build products, shop, and conduct research—this event pulls back the curtain on the real, unfiltered struggles of launching B2B companies in 2025. Get ready for a raw conversation about the good, the bad, and the ugly of the B2B journey.

title: Health2Tech Party
description: Join us for a laid-back evening on June 5th, where digital health founders and investors come together to connect, unwind, and celebrate the vibrant world of health tech—no formal agenda, just great conversation and a party atmosphere.

title: AI Agents & Co-Pilots: Shaping The Future Of Business
description: AI Agents & Co-Pilots: Shaping The Future Of Business

title: The Stable Salon Vol 4
description: Join us for the fourth edition of the Stable Salon, in collaboration with Will White - NYC’s premier gathering for the stablecoin ecosystem. This monthly series brings together founders, builders, investors, and policymakers shaping the future of digital money. Following three packed editions featuring top voices in the space, we’re back to continue the conversation. Expect thoughtful discussion, high quality connections, and a room full of people who are actually building. This event is application only and free to attend, with limited capacity. Details on speakers and location to follow.

title: VC Open Office Hours
description: In these distributed meetings from June 3rd-6th, founders meet real VCs and discuss their idea in a 20-minute intro session. These meetings are not about getting a fundraising check by the end of your chat - rather it's about convincing them to take another meeting for a deeper dive. After you RSVP, you will receive a link to sign up for meetings with investors for This event is a part of #NYTechWeek—a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem. Learn more at www.tech-week.com.

title: Pop-Up Verve Club With Wilson Sonsini At
description: Drop by the Verve Club during #NYTechWeek—an intimate, artsy space to unwind, connect, and get inspired. This event is a part of #NYTechWeek—a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem. Learn more at www.tech-week.com.

title: Code Meets Cupertino: Apple Tools For Tech Teams!
description: For dev teams, Mac is often the default—but managing scale, support, and updates shouldn’t slow you down. In 20 minutes, we’ll show you how to : * Equip your engineers with high-performance Macs at corporate rates * Access fast repair + loaner programs via iStore’s Apple-certified team * Simplify device management with zero-touch deployment // About Us// https://istorestm.com/business-program/ Hosted by iStore by St. Moritz—an Authorized Apple Premier Partner that's trusted by 500+ corporatios. With over 25 years of experience, we specializing in bridging Apple’s innovative products with personalized support and solutions for startups. Join us to unlock enterprise-level benefits without the enterprise-level requirements. This event is a part of #NYTechWeek—a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem. Learn more at www.tech-week.com

title: SEED - Social Evening For Environmental Design
description: A private evening of fine dining and mindful discussion focused on emerging environmental design. Curated by Gaian, SEED convenes a select group of 30 designers, technologists, founders, artists, and strategists to explore how we shape the built world — and how it shapes us in return.

title: AI To Fight Cancer
description: This salon-style fireside chat and networking reception will bring together leaders in AI, oncology and pet lovers to explore how AI and data are fighting cancer - on both sides of the leash. Cancer is the number one killer of dogs and the largest unmet need for pet care, and what we learn from pet cancer journeys can also help inform cures for human health. Join us to hear Christina Lopes, CEO and co-founder of FidoCure, lead a conversation about these topics! This event is a part of #NYTechWeek—a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem. Learn more at www.tech-week.com.

title: AI & The Future Of The Creator Economy
description: Beacons is hosting an exclusive, invite-only panel and networking event on how AI is reshaping creator monetization, digital storefronts, and platform infrastructure.

title: Tech For Good: AI, Wellness & Warrior Community
description: Join us at this free powerful morning with founders, funders, and future builders in health tech. We will explore how AI, community, and lived experience are reshaping mental wellness. The URAWarrior app is an AI-powered mental health community offering 24/7 support for those who keep showing up - even when it's hard. We call them Warrior!

title: GOLDEN HOUR GRIND Founder Mixer
description: Calling all Gen Z builders, dreamers, and disruptors! GFR Fund & Supernode Global is creating a space for Gen Z builders, founders, and investors together in one of the most electric tech hubs in the country 🗽✨🍎 If you’re not Gen Z but you’re excited about what we’re building and want to be part of the conversation, pull up! This is a night all about serendipitous connections, tasty bites & drinks, fireside chats, and quickfire pitches. 📅 Tuesday, June 3 | 4:00 PM – 6:00 PM ET 📍 NoMad (exact location released to approved guests) 💡 Wanna pitch? Got something exciting in the works and want some live feedback in front of GFR & SG's GPs and community? Get on the list! We're keeping it casual, think open mic nights: no decks, and keep it under 2 minutes. Be ready to answer questions and give feedback to your fellow pitchers! Spots are limited. https://airtable.com/appyIuRkH38r2vaZN/pag2ag5qJDQz5Cn8f/form Brought to you by GFR Fund 🦵 and Supernode Global 🧡 This event is a part of #NYTechWeek—a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem. Learn more at www.tech-week.com.

title: Fundraising For Impact & AI Startups
description: Join us for Fundraising for Impact & AI Startups, a NY Tech Week event bringing together visionary founders and mission-driven investors. This panel will explore the real-world strategies, challenges, and breakthroughs of raising capital in the impact & AI startup ecosystem. Hear firsthand from VC investors focused on high-potential ventures in the impact and AI space. Whether you’re building a company in the impact/AI space or looking to invest in the next generation of changemakers, this is your chance to connect with a community that values both innovation and impact. Stick around after the panel for an engaging networking session with fellow founders, VCs, and students—light catering included. Co-hosted by the IE New York College Venture Capital & Private Equity Club and the Stanford ASES New York City Chapter, let’s build the future of impact together.

title: Luncheon: AI X Entrepreneurship
description: An intimate, ticketed lunch event curated for tech leaders, founders, and researchers... featuring thought leadership, product showcases, and future-focused conversations in a rooftop setting overlooking the Manhattan skyline. This event is a part of #NYTechWeek—a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem. Learn more at www.tech-week.com.

title: Insecure Agents Podcast [LIVE]
description: Join us for a LIVE RECORDING of NYC's hottest AI security podcast, Insecure Agents with a special guest... We'll be gathering at Pensar's office for a brief recording session followed by networking and drinks. Itinerary: 7:30 PM - Doors open 8:00 PM - Live podcast recording 8:30 PM - Networking This event is a part of #NYTechWeek—a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem. Learn more at www.tech-week.com.

title: Gam3 On: Chelsea Testnet Launch For Soneium
description: Join us at New York Tech Week, on June 4th, 2–4 PM as we unveil Chelsea, the testnet launch of our groundbreaking Gaming L3 on Soneium. This marks a major milestone for the future of onchain gaming — designed for performance, scale, and seamless developer experience.

title: Happy Demo Hour
description:
Draper Startup House and Draper Associates are teaming up to showcase some of the most exciting early-stage founders from our global community. Expect bold ideas, short and sharp pitches, and a crowd of VCs, angels, and fellow builders who like their innovation shaken, not stirred. What to expect: 

* Rapid-fire startup pitches
* Connect with angel investors & other founders
* Craft drinks, great people
